mapper.select: select count(*) from ((select uuid,c.scId,sc.`no`,md.id shopId,md.shopName,md.shopAddress ,kz.nickName kzNickName,fxz.nickName fxzNickName,s.shareMoney,s.phone,ygxfDate,c.createTime,state from capital_flow_record c,share_record s,vip kz,vip fxz,share_card sc,merchant md where c.srUuid=s.uuid and s.kzOpenId=kz.openId and s.fxzOpenId=fxz.openId and c.scId=sc.id and sc.shopId=md.id and c.state=0) UNION (select uuid,c.scId,sc.`no`,md.id shopId,md.shopName,md.shopAddress,kz.nickName kzNickName,fxz.nickName fxzNickName,s.shareMoney,s.phone,ygxfDate,c.createTime,state from capital_flow_record c,share_history_record s,vip kz,vip fxz,share_card sc,merchant md where c.srUuid=s.uuid and s.kzOpenId=kz.openId and s.fxzOpenId=fxz.openId and c.scId=sc.id and sc.shopId=md.id and c.state=1)) t where t.shopId=#{shopId}
